title: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
description: Completed an undergraduate program focusing on computer applications, gaining expertise in software development, programming languages, and problem-solving skills for diverse technology challenges.

title: Higher Secondary Certificate (HSC)
description: Completed high school education, excelling in subjects with a strong aptitude for information technology and problem-solving, developing critical thinking and analytical skills for future challenges.

title: Secondary School Certificate (SSC)
description: Completed secondary education, demonstrating strong aptitude for mathematics and problem-solving, laying a solid foundation for future academic and professional pursuits.
